quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, move west. That done, look and see that the cuboid box is ajar. And then, recover the spherical key from the cuboid box in the sauna. And then, go east. Then, doublecheck that the spherical chest within the attic is unlocked with the spherical key. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: take spherical key from cuboid box
unlock spherical chest with spherical key
take spherical key from cuboid box
unlock spherical chest with spherical key

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in an attic.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The spherical chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The spherical chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a stand. The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a rack. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the rack. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cuboid box.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cuboid box contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The cuboid box is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a basement.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a cellar. You begin to take stock of what's here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a bedchamber, cool, but is it usual? You better believe it is. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You see a box.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if] You see a bar. You wonder idly who left that here. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the bar.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south.

infos.name: passageway
infos.desc: it's a rugged passageway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it's a noble door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: spherical chest
infos.desc: The spherical chest looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cuboid box
infos.desc: The cuboid box looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: box
infos.desc: The box looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: cuboid keycard
infos.desc: The cuboid keycard is cold to the touch

infos.name: mouse
infos.desc: The mouse appears out of place here

walkthrough: take spherical key from cuboid box
unlock spherical chest with spherical key

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be fantastic if you could make an attempt to go to the west. With that done, open the cuboid box inside the sauna. And then, recover the spherical key from the cuboid box in the sauna. Then, attempt to move east. That done, check that the spherical chest is unlocked with the spherical key. That's it!
